articles.title: Bombay High Court rules in favour of Netflix, Hotstar, Reliance to screen Ranveer Singh's 83 - India Today
articles.description: The Bombay High Court has now ruled in favour of Netflix, Hotstar and Reliance to screen Ranveer Singh's film, 83. 83 is based on India's 1983 World Cup win.
